name: 2-Data Preparation
content:
02-Dataset Definition and Preparation


 Data Description

The dataset is designed for analyzing demand forecasting in electronics manufacturing, focusing on uncovering sales patterns, evaluating product performance, and identifying optimization opportunities for manufacturing and inventory management.

Dataset Columns

  • Sales_Date (Date Type)
  • Represents the date of each sales transaction.
  • Used to capture time-based trends, seasonality, and cycles in demand.
  • product_category (String Type)
  • Classifies products into strategic groups (e.g., mobile devices, consumer electronics, components).
  • Facilitates segmented demand analysis by category.
  • item (String Type)
  • Unique identifier for specific products or components.
  • Enables granular-level demand forecasting at the item level.
  • Total_Quantity_Sold (Integer Type)
  • Number of units sold on a given date.
  • Serves as the target variable for demand forecasting models.


Data Preparation

  1. Data Cleaning
  • Handle Missing Data
  • Detect and impute missing values systematically.
  • For Total_Quantity_Sold, apply median imputation to preserve sales distribution while avoiding skewness.
  • Outlier Detection
  • Identify extreme values in Total_Quantity_Sold.
  • Assess whether anomalies result from:
  • Data entry errors.
  • Unusual market events (e.g., sudden spikes from promotions).
  • Seasonal variations (e.g., festive sales surges).
  • Consistency Check
  • Verify Sales_Date formats and ensure no gaps in the timeline.
  • Standardize product_category labels.
  • Validate item names to ensure uniqueness and consistent mapping.


Strategic Insights from Data Preparation

  • Improved Forecast Accuracy: Clean and consistent data reduces noise, enabling more reliable demand forecasts.
  • Optimized Production Planning: Early detection of demand spikes helps align manufacturing schedules with market needs.
  • Better Inventory Management: Prevents overstocking or understocking by ensuring accurate sales tracking.
  • Category-Level Insights: Highlights high-potential product categories for focused resource allocation.
